name: Youkai Yashiki HD
description:
«Youkai Yashiki HD» - is a remake one of the progenitors of horror genre. Your friend went to explore an abandoned house, which is rumored to be haunted by ghosts. After she was lost, you decide to rescue her. All what you have is your faithful flashlight and youthful recklessness. Good luck!

This is a computer game, which we (me and my friend) made for a month.

Play online here: http://engraver-deer-36828.bitballoon.com

Original: https://www.gamefaqs.com/famicomds/578497-youkai-yashiki 
Original gameplay: https://youtu.be/fwdDU0_VW5E 
Music: https://wav-library.net 
Sprites of fire: http://powstudios.com 
Easter egg: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shadow_Warrior_(1997_video_game)
